security_audit.summary: This skill consists only of documentation files (SKILL.md, skill-report.json) describing the Tavily web search API. No executable code exists in the package. The static scanner misinterpreted JSON code blocks in documentation as shell commands and misidentified metadata fields as cryptographic patterns. All findings are false positives from documentation parsing errors.

content.user_title: Search the web with real-time results
content.value_statement: Get current information beyond AI training data. Access live web results with intelligent query optimization and source verification.
actual_capabilities: Query Tavily API for web search results
Filter and rank search results by relevance
Extract key snippets and metadata from pages
Handle API errors and rate limits gracefully
Support custom search parameters and domains
limitations: Rate limited by Tavily service tiers
Cannot access paywalled or private content
Search results depend on Tavily's index coverage

use_cases.title: Academic research with sources
use_cases.description: Find recent papers, articles, and credible sources for research projects with automatic citation formatting.

use_cases.title: Technical documentation search
use_cases.description: Get latest API docs, library updates, and coding examples from official sources and community forums.

use_cases.title: Market and news monitoring
use_cases.description: Track industry news, competitor updates, and market trends with real-time web monitoring.

prompt_templates.title: Basic search
prompt_templates.prompt: Search for: [your question]. Provide 3-5 relevant results with brief summaries.

prompt_templates.title: Research compilation
prompt_templates.prompt: Research [topic] and compile findings from multiple sources. Include recent developments and key statistics.

prompt_templates.title: Technical lookup
prompt_templates.prompt: Find the official documentation for [technology/feature]. Include code examples and best practices.

prompt_templates.title: Comparative analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare [option A] vs [option B] based on recent reviews and feature updates. Create a comparison table.

output: TypeScript 5.0 Introduces Decorators and Performance Improvements
Key features: Native decorators, const type parameters, bundler resolution
Performance: Up to 10% faster compilation for large projects
Migration guide: Step-by-step upgrade instructions available

output_examples.input: What are the best Python frameworks for web development in 2024
output: Django: Full-stack framework with ORM, authentication, and admin panel
FastAPI: Modern async framework with automatic API documentation
Flask: Lightweight micro-framework for simple applications
Each framework has different trade-offs for project complexity and team size

best_practices: Use specific keywords and phrases for better search results
Specify date ranges when looking for recent information
Combine multiple searches for comprehensive topic coverage
anti_patterns: Searching for personal or sensitive information
Relying on single source without verification
Using without proper API key configuration

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Integrates seamlessly through standard protocols.

faq.question: Are there search limits?
faq.answer: Limited by your Tavily API plan. Free tier includes 100 queries monthly. Paid plans offer more.

faq.question: How do I integrate with my workflow?
faq.answer: Configure Tavily API key in your AI tool settings. Use natural language to request searches.

faq.question: Is my search data secure?
faq.answer: Searches go directly to Tavily API. No data is stored or logged by this skill.

faq.question: Why am I getting no results?
faq.answer: Check API key configuration and query format. Very specific or recent topics may have limited results.

faq.question: How does this compare to built-in search?
faq.answer: Provides real-time web results versus static training data. Better for current events and recent developments.
